summary: A simple esp that converts Reaper\'s Hunter\'s Armor into light armor and upgradable.
descriptionHtml:
Original Mod : Reaper\'s Hunter\'s Armor by Reaper9111

Modified by : Saaya

--------------------------

DESCRIPTION :

By request, this is a modification of the Nord Hunter\'s Armor, uploaded with the permission of Reaper.

What is does :

- converts the heavy armor into light armor, with lower weight ( cuirass : 10, boots : 3, gauntlets : 2 ) and lower material requirements.

- places it under the HIDE section of the forge.

- makes the armor upgradable ( you will need 1 steel ingot and 1 leather piece for each part ).

- the armor rating and the price are the same.

---------------------------

INSTALLATION :

1) You need to install Reaper\'s mod FIRST ( my archive only contains the modified ESP ) :

http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/16138

2) Replace his ESP with mine. 

3) Enjoy the cleavage. \"/OO\\\"

----------------------------

Credits
=======

echo 1162 for the CBBE version of the Savior\'s Hide

Remember to ENDORSE the mod if you like it !
author: Reaper and Saaya
